messages.content: Shailesh has proved to be a strong and effective voice in ensuring and reflecting the big constituency, which runs from the borders of Lincolnshire in the North to Peterborough, down to the border of Huntingdon, and many villages beyond.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Shailesh works includes seeking more police and fighting crime, supporting local health services, ensuring appropriate funding for schools, assisting housing developments, working on planning applications, and supporting business and various communities.
Our defence services will care for our armed forces and veterans, and keep the threat of terrorism, cyber, and nuclear attack at bay while providing EUs with new intelligence capabilities.

mentions.candidate: Shailesh lives in the constituency and has been your MP since 2005.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
issues.defence: A Safer Britain—our defence services will care for our armed forces and veterans.
issues.economy: Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and create secure and well-paid jobs. Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe economically.
issues.immigration: We will make sure we are in control of immigration.

leaflet.personalStatement: Shailesh was born in Uganda and moved to the UK with his family.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has worked with many local bodies and organisations on various issues and has also served in senior Government positions.
